si.ijs.kt.clus.util

Class ClusLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • si.ijs.kt.clus.util.ClusLogger

  • public class ClusLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the logging class. From anywhere in Clus use ClusLogger. to log messages. Default output stream is the console. If you want to log to file, create a logging.properties file in the same folder as the Clus executable. Read http://www.vogella.com/tutorials/Logging/article.html before changing anything.
    Author:
    martinb
